sentences.en: Blows and wounds cleanse away evil, and beatings purge the inmost being.
sentences.cn: 鞭伤除净人的罪恶.责打能入人的心腹.

sentences.en: He knew in his inmost heart that he was behaving badly.
sentences.cn: 在他内心最深处他知道自己行为恶劣。

sentences.en: Heat thermal series, warm inmost life!
sentences.cn: 热力保暖系列, 温暖从心开始!

sentences.en: His inmost thoughts are not healthy.
sentences.cn: 他心灵深处的思想是不健康的.

sentences.en: I could keep my passion pure by concealing it in the inmost recesses of my heart.
sentences.cn: 我能够把自己纯洁的热情藏在内心深处.

sentences.en: I could see the inmost recesses.
In his inmost heart, he knew he didn’t love me.
sentences.cn: 内心深处他知道自己并不爱我。

sentences.en: She sought to discern his inmost thoughts.
sentences.cn: 她想方设法要了解他内心深处的想法.

sentences.en: Something in your inmost being tell you this is surely true.
sentences.cn: 在你的内心深处说着这是真的!

sentences.en: The inmost, choicest, or essential part; the pith.
sentences.cn: 实质, 精华,精髓:最深层 、 最紧要或最必要的部分; 精华.

sentences.en: Their inmost soul is tortured by an agony of passion.
sentences.cn: 他们的灵魂深处被热情啮蚀.

sentences.en: Their light penetrates to dark comers, and is capable of reaching to inmost recesses.
sentences.cn: 阳光可以射到每个黑暗的角落, 它无所不及.

sentences.en: Those inmost breathings which there found words took hold upon him.
sentences.cn: 他内心的情感经过文字的表达把他自己迷住了.

sentences.en: We discover in these songs our very inmost activities and sufferings.
sentences.cn: 我们在这些歌里发现了我们内心中最深切的情感和痛苦.

sentences.en: Will light the inmost shrine of my heart?
sentences.cn: 会照亮我内心深处秘密的圣殿 吗 ?
你看出了我内心深处的思想.

words.tran_cn: 内心的；最里面的，最深处的；秘密的
向内的；内部的；精神的；本质上的；熟悉的
进入；当选；（服装等）时髦；在屋里
按照（表示方式）；从事于；在…之内

trans.tran_cn: 最内的，最深的，纯粹私人的，最秘密的
trans.tran_en: your inmost feelings, desires etc are your most personal and secret ones
